text: Charles Welchman LingJustus Anglican was the inaugural Bishop of Banks and Torres.List of small publications in the Archives of the Anglican Church of Melanesia (in the National Archives of Solomon Islands) p. 20. (Accessed 9 February 2020) Ling was educated at St Peter's College, Siota. After his ordination in 1969, Ling worked in the Solomon Islands, the New Hebrides and Vanuatu.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1980-1982 p611 Oxford, OUP, 1983 Ling died on his home island of Mota Lava in 2018.Melanesia News ==References== Category:2018 deaths Category:Alumni of St Peter's College, Siota Category:Anglican bishops in Oceania Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of Banks and Torres Category:Diocese of Banks and Torres
